thread.title: Donald Trump's placating speech to Congress cannot undo damage done by his words of hate: Brent Larkin
thread.title_full: Donald Trump's placating speech to Congress cannot undo damage done by his words of hate: Brent Larkin

author: Brent Larkin, cleveland.com
title: Donald Trump's placating speech to Congress cannot undo damage done by his words of hate: Brent Larkin
text: Hate crimes become more likely when, through his word and deeds, a man in President Trump's position uses language suggesting many or most people entering this country are terrorists or criminals who want to steal our jobs, writes Brent Larkin.
